block.p: Dara Blake Gilwit, the daughter of Randie and Mark Gilwit of Coral Springs, Fla., was married last evening to David Andrew Hammerman, a son of Barbara and Michael Hammerman of Jericho, N.Y. Rabbi Lawrence M. Schuval officiated at the Biltmore Hotel in Coral Gables.

Mrs. Hammerman, 29, is a litigation associate at Hughes Hubbard & Reed, the New York law firm. She graduated magna cum laude from the University of Pennsylvania and received her law degree from Washington University in St. Louis.

Dara Blake Gilwit, the daughter of Randie and Mark Gilwit of Coral Springs, Fla., was married last evening to David Andrew Hammerman, a son of Barbara and Michael Hammerman of Jericho, N.Y. Rabbi Lawrence M. Schuval officiated at the Biltmore Hotel in Coral Gables.

Mrs. Hammerman, 29, is a litigation associate at Hughes Hubbard & Reed, the New York law firm. She graduated magna cum laude from the University of Pennsylvania and received her law degree from Washington University in St. Louis.
Mr. Hammerman, 28, is a corporate associate in the New York office of Latham & Watkins, the law firm. He graduated from Emory and received his law degree cum laude from Fordham.
